about_the_game:
Become a rhythm hero in this captivating indie arcade game where each level is a musical journey through boundless stars. Thirty levels await you, each with its own captivating melody inspired by the beauty of space.

Your actions on the ship will become notes, and the cosmos will serve as a platform for your musical performances. Follow the rhythm closely and guide your ship through galactic obstacles and asteroid fields to reveal the full melody. Showcase your skill as you navigate the challenges the cosmos presents, and avoid crashing into obstacles.

Key Features of "Stellar Tunes":

Starlit Journey: Immerse yourself in unique melodies, traveling through 30 levels, each of which is like a star in the night sky – unique and unparalleled.
Rhythmic Control: Follow the rhythm of the music to play the notes and stay in harmony with the melody.
Cosmic Challenges: Overcome the trials of space, reacting to asteroids and environmental changes to reach your goal and stay in rhythm.
Visual Splendor: Uncover a colorful space filled with details and cosmic beauty.

Embrace the challenge and meet the rhythm of the cosmos with "Stellar Tunes." Let your musical side flourish as you journey among the stars, creating your unique melody of cosmic harmony.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Stellar Tunes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
